description: Keep it casual in the Men's Pom Pom Hoody, made with midweight fleece and washed for softness from the first wear. Pull on the jersey-lined hood, cinch the drawcords, and tuck your hands in the kangaroo pocket if you get chilly. This pullover hoodie features our furry namesake, front and center.
name: Marmot Pom Pom Hoody - Mens
